(Simplified: 鸲)
Chinese Definition:
①(鴝鵒)鳥，能模仿人說話。亦稱“八哥兒”。
②鳥類的一屬，體小，尾巴長，嘴短而尖，羽毛美麗。

鴝字的基本解释

鴝
qú
见“鸲”。

鴝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
［《廣韻》古侯切，平侯，見。］
“鸲1”的繁体字。亦作“鸜1”。
鸟类的一属。体小，尾长，羽毛美丽，嘴短而尖。参见“鴝掇”、“鴝眼”。
[②]［gōu］
［《集韻》居矦切，平矦，見。］
“鸲2”的繁体字。
见“鴝2鶹”。
[③]［gòu］
［《集韻》居切，去，見。］
“鸲3”的繁体字。
雉鸣。

鴝字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴝； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1486第05
〔古文〕??【唐韻】其俱切【集韻】權俱切，?音劬。【說文】鴝鵒。【爾雅翼】鴝鵒，似鵙而有幘，飛輒成羣。字書謂之哵哵鳥。一名鴝?。一作鸜。【山海經註】鸜鵒，鴝鵒也。【正字通】又名八哥。幽明錄云：五月五日，翦其舌端使圓，敎令學語，能人言。又鴝掇，蟲名。【列子·天瑞篇】蝴蝶胥也。化而爲蟲，生竈下，其狀若脫，其名曰鴝掇。鴝掇千日，化而爲鳥，其名爲乾餘骨。又【廣韻】古侯切【集韻】居侯切，?音鉤。【廣韻】鴝鵒鳥。【集韻】鵂鶹也。又【集韻】居?切，音冓。鳥聲，雉鳴也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
["Guangyun" Ancient Houqie, Pinghou, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲1". Also known as "Yu 1".
A genus of birds. Small body, long tail, beautiful feathers, short and pointed mouth. See "鸲掇", "鸲眼".
[②]［gōu］
["Jiyun" is cut and flat, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲2".
See "Birds 2".
[③]［gòu］
["Jiyun" is cut, go, see. ]
Traditional characters for "鸲3".
Pheasant call.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸲; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1486 No. 05
〔古文〕??【Tang Yun】It's all cut [Ji Yun] The right is all cut, and the sound is 劬. [Said the text] robin. 【Erya Wing】The wobbler, like a scorpion but has a scorpion, flies in groups. The word book is called the 哵哵 bird. A robin? One for all. [Notes on Shanhaijing] Hookah, Hookah also. 【Zhengzitong】Also known as Myna. Youming Luyun: On May 5th, the end of his tongue was rounded, and he commanded to learn language and was able to speak. Also, the name of the insect. 【Liezi·Tianrui】Butterfly Xuye. It turns into a worm and grows under the stove. Its shape is like off, and its name is 鸲掇. A thousand days of the roan, turned into a bird, its name is Ganyugu. [Guangyun] Guhouqie [Jiyun] Juhouqie, sound hook. 【Guangyun】The wobbler bird. 【Ji Yun】Euye also. [Jiyun] Habitat? Cut, sound 冓. Birds and pheasants sing.
